io.sphere.client.shop.model

Class VariantAvailability

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.client.shop.model.VariantAvailability

  • public class VariantAvailability
extends java.lang.Object
    Stock availability of a variant in a product catalog.

    This information is replicated from variant's inventory entry, purely as an optimization. getRestockableInDays matches InventoryEntry.getRestockableInDays, isOnStock is true if and only if InventoryEntry.quantityOnStock is greater than 0.

    Note:The corresponding InventoryEntry is the immediate source of truth. The information in VariantAvailability is updated asynchronously when inventory entries are modified, and is therefore eventually consistent.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getRestockableInDays()
      The number of days required to restock the product variant.
      boolean isOnStock()
      True if the quantity on stock for the product variant is greater than 0.
